name: Collateral
description:
Collateral is a card game where you don't decide which card is played. Each turn you are presented with three cards, choose one to turn over. The game then randomly plays one of the still face-up cards, for better or for worse.  

You play as a man who's life is flashing before his eyes after a near-fatal car accident. The  cards you make affect the past, which in turn has consequences on the nature of the crash.

(Game Jam theme: Out of Control)
